½ cup butter ½ teaspoon salt

½ cup sugar ½ teaspoon vanilla
Beat butter until soft. Gradually add sugars and blend until creamy. Beat in remaining ingredients except flour.
Add flour after thoroughly mixed. Roll dough into small balls. Place them on a greased cookie sheet.
Criss-­‐cross with a fork. Bake 10 to 12 minutes.
